column5: Just wondering if these guys are still guiding? And has anyone of you guys out there gone out with them? Looking to book A guided trip for my father and I with someone if we ever get any hardwater this season. Cheers guys!
I don't know if they are still operating but if you need any info on guides on quinte your more then welcome to PM me.  Aadil
Check out quinte ice fishing team...
as far as I know Gary Hodge is still a guide.
There's a new outfit on Quinte that a friend of mine runs called Quinte Hardwater Specialists.  Check out their website.  QHS
Thanks Ben, we've certainly seen Aadil's success out there on Quinte.
